name: Ball Master
overview: BallMaster is a puzzle game with a simple basic idea and (hopefully) addictive gameplay. It is based on an old game named Logical. This game tries to bring its idea to newer Amiga hardware and also tries to extend the original game with some new ideas. Game contains source code. It has 100 levels of play and password access every 5 levels. It was released on the Amiga Classix 3 compilation.
